divs: Sighting Detailshunting i it landed about 550 yrs from me i new it was something I never saw before in this world at frist when I saw it it looked like the sky but when it got close it was shine and refleted the sky that who ever was in would see me.I was worryed.I got in a place where I felt safe and watched this thing for a hr 28 min, at that point it took off to the south not making a sound and whet over some mnt and that is the last I saw of it it has bbeen on my mind ever since.
Summary: saw a disk land in a meadow
